goal: Access Wi-Fi settings and toggle Wi-Fi on/off
description: Navigate to Wi-Fi settings and toggle the Wi-Fi connection
expected_outcome: Wi-Fi settings should be accessible and Wi-Fi can be toggled

subtasks.name: open settings app
subtasks.info: Locate and tap the Settings gear icon from home screen or app drawer to launch Settings application

subtasks.name: wait for settings to load
subtasks.info: Wait for Settings app to fully load and display the main menu with scrollable categories

subtasks.name: tap network & internet
subtasks.info: Scroll if needed and tap 'Network & internet' option in Settings main menu to access network settings

subtasks.name: tap internet option
subtasks.info: In Network & internet page, tap 'Internet' option to access Wi-Fi and mobile data settings

subtasks.name: toggle wifi switch
subtasks.info: Locate the Wi-Fi toggle switch at the right side of Wi-Fi option and tap to enable or disable Wi-Fi connectivity

verification_criteria: Wi-Fi toggle is visible and functional
Wi-Fi state changes when toggle is pressed
success_indicators: Wi-Fi toggle switch is present and clickable
